website_summaries.verdict: An attractively designed throw pillow that holds its color. Features a removable cover.
pros: the rugged cover can be removed
A good value for the money
cons: The pillows arrive flat, and while most report that shape quickly returns, a few say they stay too flat for comfort
The colors may be a little lighter than anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: By far these are they best pillows and quality for the price. My only compliant is that they are very thin. When I first received the box in the mail and I opened it up, there were 2 boxes inside. I first thought to myself I hope I did not just order pillow cases. Thankfully I did not since Ive5done it before because I did not read the description. When I opened the boxes they pillows were vacuum sealed. Every easy to open in out into cases. Other then the the pillows being very thin these are a great buy . I just order some thicker pillows off of Amazon for $7.99 to replace the ones that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Carter

customer_reviews.title: What's In the Box?
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are packaged beautifullly and come shipped in a flat sturdy box. Inside, is the cover w/zipper and the pillow part is in a non-reusable space bag and shrunk to fit the box. The pillow is form is cheaply made but fluffs up to a nice size. These would not be sturdy enough for a sofa or place that would get everyday use, but since I'm using them in my guestroom as decorative throw pillows on the bed, they are perfect for my needs. Price was right, and I can't make them for this. Again - these are just decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stouch

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, don’t love the pillow insert
customer_reviews.text: The covers of these are perfect. Durable fabric, vibrant color, and great pattern. My only issue is that the pillow insert they provide is awful. Even after airing it out and trying to puff it up, it’s still really thin and not comfortable. I’m going to have to go buy actual pillows now to go inside since the ones provided were awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I think the pillows are cute, however, the colors are not as vibrant in person as they are in the picture. For example, the lime green in the photo is definitely not lime green in person. It's closer to a light olive. The pillows themselves are also VERY thin. They do come double vacuum packed and I only opened them tonight. It's possible that they will fluff up in time. Finally, they seem smaller than 18 inches. I ordered 4 pillows to cover a 72 inch bench and I'm about half a pillow short. They were really inexpensive so I'm sure I'll find something to do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Andi B.

customer_reviews.title: The picture does not depict what they look like. I wanted the pillow that was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today. The picture does not depict what they look like. I wanted the pillow that was advertised. What I received is just “ok” and I wouldn’t have purchased had I known they would be different. See my photo. Not very fluffy. I need pillows for a function tonite. Quality seems ok but Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Flat pillow. No Fluff
customer_reviews.text: These pillows suck. I like the pattern, but the fabric is stiff and rough to the touch. Most of all, they're FLAT after some serious fluffing. Cheapos. Put more fill in the pillows so they're soft!
customer_reviews.author: Yankees98

customer_reviews.title: ... after putting it in the dryer for 5 minutes like everyone suggested
customer_reviews.text: Pillow ripped open and came apart after putting it in the dryer for 5 minutes like everyone suggested. They came completely flat and lifeless and now, they're everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than photo. High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cushion was VERY well packaged. Looks better than photo. The cushion insert isn't fluffy like a regular cushion, but actually this worked for me because I wanted it for the back of porch rocking chairs. Perfect. Would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: RedMolly250

customer_reviews.title: Thin pillows with rough cover
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are much too thin. Even after expanding, they are still not comfortable. The cover is also very rough, feels like burlap sack. The only reason we bought them is to match the curtains, which they do well. But they are not comfortable and are not worth $14. They would be good only for show, and not for actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This picture is very misleading. Its a beautiful pillow when the print is centered like pictured but not so much when its not. Mine have this pattern but its not radiating from the middle, making the effect much more blah. I liked that it shipped with the pillow airtight and flat but even over night it hasnt fluffed up much. In general a fail.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kalkstein

customer_reviews.title: Weird brown substance on pillow itself
customer_reviews.text: The pillow itself was damaged. Part of the pillow underneath was brown on one side (very large spot). It looked like some weird substance was underneath the cover or perhaps a bug infestation as I saw odd little brown specs on the outside of the pillow. And it was ripped as well. Don't think I'll be buying anything from these guys again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The pillows required a bit of fluffing, but i love the bright, bold pattern of this pillow! The fabric feels like it will hold up well outside and is comparable to other outdoor pillows we have paid more for at other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lin09

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Cute pillow. Put it on our front porch swing. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Jamie McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Inserts flat, but beautiful covers
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows, colors are vibrant and the material is nice and hefty. Not so thrilled with the inserts, they were flat. I ended up adding my old pillows [which were about 3 Inches smaller] in with the flat insert and now they look perfect. Even if I had to buy a new insert, I would still purchase these pillows again.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. Color as shown. Looks great on my bench on patio. Bought 2. Have not tried in Rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows. They are a perfit size and not over stuffed just enought. Very well made,
customer_reviews.author: Floydean Hair

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little flat
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this pillow that I did not like, is that it is not puffy enough, somewhat flat. Colors and texture are good. It came vacuumed flat in plastic and when you remove the pillow from the bag, air gets in and blows it up but I like them a little more full.
customer_reviews.author: heidi scott

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfectly and have lasted a long time! I use them for the “decorative” pillows on my bed. They are durable and washable, and the color has stayed and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle AB

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: I wish you would put more stuffing in the pillows, they just seem a little flat for me, but the case was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw pillow cover
customer_reviews.text: Love! Wish I’d bought more. And now I can’t seem to order anymore. Color is perfect. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: The Awesome Aunt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for blending green into my Mom’s former turquoise living room. Bright and fun, just as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Initial impressions are positive
customer_reviews.text: Colors are vibrant. Fabric feels perfect for the outdoors. I am not a fan of the interior pillows but that is ok, I can still put the cases over pillows I already have. The interior pillows are very flat.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Mom

customer_reviews.title: While these pillowcases are a little stiff and feel like they'd work better for outdoor furniture but I got ...
customer_reviews.text: While these pillowcases are a little stiff and feel like they'd work better for outdoor furniture but I got them for my bedroom. I'm still happy with this purchase despite that.
customer_reviews.author: AntRiz44

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality pillows!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! Very impressed with these pillows and the packaging they arrived in! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, especially for the price. Color is vibrant and fabric is thick. Tried to purchase more but they ran out of the split scheme I have.
customer_reviews.author: alesi143

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are surprisingly durable. They've made it through quite a few pillow fights and couch naps and haven't torn anywhere. I hope they add more patterns with this fabric; I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kealy Garner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow and reasonably priced. No complaints thus far. Too early to tell durability and ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sal C.

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly pretty and well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly pretty and well made for the price. Rivals other pillows that cost 4x as much. And came in a nice box too. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but poor material
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and looks as described, however super scratchy and not very comfortable. Decorative is a strong word here
customer_reviews.author: Ras53f

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow, fabric is sturdy, colors are true and it is not overly full. Looks great on my bed with teal and white coverlet.
customer_reviews.author: ceciled99

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor pillows for perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great outdoor pillows for perfect price. Bright colors and well constructed. I just bought 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Broster

customer_reviews.title: Will recommmend
customer_reviews.text: Products looks very high quality. Though a bit more expensive than similar ones at Walmart, I think this is of better quality. Feels and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Nii A.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in how flat this pillow is
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in how flat this pillow is. I tried fluffing it up. Tried fluffing in the dryer. I know eventually they will flatten out some, but not brand new. The cover is real nice, no problem with that.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor pillows. Pretty vivid colors that have not faded in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Red114

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these pillows and covers. Perfect size. Vibrant colors. Just like photo. As advertised. Great for my patio couch.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Quality pillow cover
customer_reviews.text: This pillow cover just arrived today, it looks of high quality and strong material. Time will tell out in our bright Ca sun though!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: i really like these pillows
customer_reviews.text: I just go these and am really impressed with the color quality. Really like them and would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wurzer

customer_reviews.title: In reality they are deflated and super thin. The covering is nice
customer_reviews.text: In the picture these pillows look really plush and full. In reality they are deflated and super thin. The covering is nice, but you probably want to use the covering with thicker pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Psyched!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! I am thrilled with these pillows! So much better then I expected. Great service from company with both shopping and packaging. Quality product, colors vibrant. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great colors and design!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows look lovely in my outdoor teakwood furniture. I was looking for something fun, bright, and festive to cheer up a blah porch and these did the trick with minimal effort. Score! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: trip_dont_fall

customer_reviews.title: These pillows (at least mine) did not fluff up once ...
customer_reviews.text: These pillows (at least mine) did not fluff up once opened - they are by far the flattest pillows over ever seen. Fabric is very rough- too rough to be couch pillows-
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: Color and fabric are great - they seem very durable. Stuffing is a little light - they are not nearly as full looking at I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It is a great size, beautiful colors and fabric. I love the cover zips off for cleaning! I am going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pillows. Got two for my grey couch. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love pattern and colors but stuffing very inadequate.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pattern and colors which is why I gave it 3 stars. There was not enough stuffing, needed about 50 percent more. Now i have to purchase fill for it myself.
customer_reviews.author: angie reichle

customer_reviews.title: The pillows are pretty thin. Not awesome
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are pretty thin. Not awesome, but they are decorative and decent. I put them on a couch at work. I don't think I'd want them for home.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Material of pillow was nice. Insert was so flat I needed to combine ...
customer_reviews.text: Material of pillow was nice. Insert was so flat I needed to combine two inserts together to create one pillow. I would return if they did not match as well as they did.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love the print on the pillow case
customer_reviews.text: The pillow inserts arrive compressed which is a bit worrisome as they are as flat as a pancake...They do fluff up on their own or you can fluff them if your anxious to use them right away. I love the print on the pillow case, and the fact that they have a zipper so you can easily wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pillow was great! The blue was Just a little lighter than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Noble

customer_reviews.title: The insert padding is on the thin side but perfect for a pillow to be used behind your back
customer_reviews.text: These outdoor pillows are just what my porch needed. The colors are bright and the fabric durable. The insert padding is on the thin side but perfect for a pillow to be used behind your back. I would make this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: These pillows are really nice. I use them for indoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are really nice. I use them for indoor pillows. My only negative is that I expected them to be a tad bit bigger. Other than that, no complaints :)
customer_reviews.author: LFreeman

customer_reviews.title: when it arrives in a box it may look like "bedding" but don't worry
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry...when it arrives in a box it may look like "bedding" but don't worry. Open it up and you'll see the pillow vacuum sealed. Break the seal and the pillow comes to life.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my living room sofa and it really perks it up. Great quality, am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cristina marcolino

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. Fabric is a little rough but that’s okay. Was worried by other reviews these would be flat but if fluff out the insert they look fine

customer_reviews.title: Great for Patio furniture
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are perfect for outdoor furniture, they ship shrinkwrapped and so take a couple days to plump up, but great fabric and ultimately a comfy pillow
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wedum

customer_reviews.title: they're beautiful vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are an incredible deal! they're beautiful vibrant color ..the pillows aren't extremely fluffy but very adequate, wonderful accent pillows and they came very very quickly👌 highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The material is nice more outdoor fabric than indoor
customer_reviews.text: The color was not as shown. I understand there are some differences in computer screens but it was a teal/turquoise color opposed to an actual blue. The material is nice more outdoor fabric than indoor. Overall nice product. Im happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design but cloth quality poor. Bought 2 others form different companies and it was a world of difference as far as quality, texture and design.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very nice

customer_reviews.title: Described perfectly in the post.  Comes folded up with pillow inside box.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for (matched our rug). Love it (and bought a total of 4)

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t come with a pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and matches well in my room

customer_reviews.text: These are very nice material and can be washed. Not vey puffy pillows

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, but flat pillow
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cover was good for the price, but I would recommend getting your own inserts. Theirs come vacuum packed, & are therefore quite flat. I would have preferred a much fluffier pillow-look.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Loved pillows

customer_reviews.title: The pillows look great--just wished that the stuffing was a ...
customer_reviews.text: The pillows look great--just wished that the stuffing was a little thicker--also the boxes that the pillows arrived in were very high quality boxes--not sure if they really needed to be?

The color is nice and pattern too but pillow is very flat.

customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my daughter in law to go on the sofa. She wanted the trellis pattern. I never saw throw pillows that came in a flat box with the pillow and cover separate, flat as a pancake. There were no directions to tell how to puff up the pillows. I haven't been to her home since then to see how they came out. I won't give a 5 because of the way the product is flattened out.

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Decorative Square 18 x 18 Inch Throw Pillow - Navy & White Moroccan Quatrefoil Lattice Cushion Pillow
product_meta.description:
Top-Rated Decorative Square Throw Pillow!

The every-style accent pillow works great in, both, indoor and outdoor space. It will add a pop of color to your furniture ensemble. The Moroccan Throw Pillow with a sophisticated color palette brings a unique style to your home decor. Perfectly cut to be extra fluffy, you'll not only love admiring it from afar but snuggling up to it too. These Toss Pillows are mildew resistant and offer UV protection to resist fading. The removable pillow covers make cleaning convenient. You can spot clean or handwash the cover fabric with mild detergent. Lounge in style with this weather and UV-resistant corded square - 18 inches throw pillow. Infused with a trendy pattern, this throw pillow will be a charming and functional extension to your patio.
feature_bullets: Package includes 18 by 18 inches pillow with navy and white quatrefoil pillow cover
Moroccan-inspired pattern with a sophisticated color palette brings style to your outdoor setting
Spun polyester exterior fabric and 100 percent polyester interior fiberfill dries easily; comes with a regular zipper, without piping
Square 18 inches throw pillow is, both, mold and mildew resistant and features UV protection to resist fading
Removable pillow cover makes washing really easy; spot clean or hand wash the fabric with mild detergent

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars371 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
